Text.Page:
Greetings! I'm Amarre.

You are..., eh?

You were helping out the Mysterium, right?

I might sound a bit cold, but the crystallization from the Murderwings and Mournwings is just one characteristic.

Flying has more meaning to it in the insect monster ecosystem than you can imagine.

Sure, the cure is important, but we must concentrate on their flying patterns and territories.
